name: San Francisco SCORE
description: Free and confidential business counseling plus low-cost workshops; over 50 retired and active professionals available to help
fullDescription: SCORE is a nonprofit network of volunteer business mentors. San Francisco SCORE offers free mentoring and low-cost workshops to help small business owners succeed.
whatTheyOffer:
- Free one-on-one business mentoring
- Mentors are experienced business professionals
- Low-cost workshops on business topics
- Online resources and templates
- Guidance on starting, growing, or transitioning a business
- Over 50 local mentors available
howToGetIt:
1. Visit sanfrancisco.score.org
2. Browse mentor profiles and areas of expertise
3. Request a free mentoring session online
4. Meet with your mentor (in-person or virtual)
5. Continue meeting as neededâ€”it's always free
keywords: SCORE, San Francisco, business mentor, free mentoring, small business, startup, entrepreneur, business coaching, workshops, consulting
